					<item>
			<title>Saskatchewan's first mental hospital closing its doors after 100 years</title>

						<description>NORTH BATTLEFORD, Sask. - At its peak, the massive red-brick complex with a scenic view of he North Saskatchewan River was a community unto itself.

					<item>
